name: AI Triage Assistant
tagline: Routes issues and requests to the right knowledge, system, or expert
overview: The AI Triage Assistant serves as the intelligent entry point to Cummins AI capabilities. It understands natural language questions and requests, determines intent, and routes users to the most appropriate agent, knowledge base, or human expert. Think of it as a smart switchboard that ensures every query gets to the right place quickly.
whatItDoes: Interprets natural language questions and requests from employees
Classifies intent and identifies the best destination (agent, system, or expert)
Routes to specialized agents like Service Technician Copilot or HR Onboarding
Provides direct answers when appropriate from approved knowledge sources
Escalates to human experts when AI cannot confidently help
prompts: I have a question about a fault code on an X15 engine
How do I submit a PTO request?
I need help understanding a supplier contract clause
What's the process for reporting a near-miss safety incident?
Can you help me find the torque specs for a cylinder head?
outputs: Direct answers with source citations when appropriate
Escalation to human experts with context summary
Clarifying questions when intent is unclear

impact.description: Questions reach the right resource on first attempt

guardrails: Assistive onlyâ€”humans remain accountable for all decisions
Routes to human experts when confidence is below threshold
Does not access systems requiring elevated privileges
Transparent about what it can and cannot do
All routing decisions are logged for review
